nodes.bodyText:
Can you add test in ScalarFunctionsTest.testFromBase64 instead of it case?
Maybe you can add a nested function call to verify this.

nodes.bodyText:
We can not use new String directly, because we don't know the default coder must be UTF-8.
Maybe we can use BinaryString.fromBytes?
